reviews.review:
CS:GO in its own right, is a fun FPS.
On the other hand, it's community is one of the worst I've experienced, from people in Silver expecting you to play like you're in Gold Nova, to a guy and his gamer girl old man, being toxic and killing you when you tell the gamer girl to stfu.
Its not a bad game to play for fun and other.
This is it, that's all you need to know.
Good crisp game and if you can get your trust factor high enough hackers become a minimal problem, havnt encountered one in a long time
Игра ахуенная,но если в нее не играть

Ihan kiva ammuskelupeli. Onhan se mukava väillä virtuaalielämässä vähän ammuskella pukspuks ja pokspoks. Verijäljet ehkä vähän ällöttää mut kyl niihinki niiQ tottuu tai sillee tietsä, ja nehän on digitaalista verta onnex. Riks Raks ja Poks
its a relly good game and i have so fun
